Brand.title: 苹果
Brand.description: iPhone 搭载 iOS/iPadOS 系统

Firmware.title: Firmware File - Database of Stock ROM (Flash File)
Firmware.description: FirmwareFile provides original mobile firmware ROMs for 351 brands, including flash tools, USB drivers, and installation guides, hosted on Google Drive and MediaFire.

Firmware.title: Android MTK - Howto Guide and Root Tutorials
Firmware.description: Android MTK offers root tutorials, USB drivers, Android tools, and stock firmware for MediaTek devices, with detailed how-to guides.

Firmware.title: Xiaomi Firmware Updater
Firmware.description: Official Xiaomi firmware updates, including Recovery ROMs, Fastboot ROMs, and OTA packages for Xiaomi, Redmi, and POCO devices.

Firmware.title: MIUI Official Downloads
Firmware.description: Official MIUI website offering stable and developer ROMs for Xiaomi devices, including HyperOS and MIUI for global and Chinese markets.

Firmware.title: Xiaomi.eu Community ROMs
Firmware.description: Xiaomi.eu provides multi-language MIUI ROMs based on official Chinese firmware, optimized for global users with additional features.

Firmware.title: SamMobile Firmware Database
Firmware.description: SamMobile offers a comprehensive database of Samsung firmware for various devices, with detailed changelogs and installation guides.

Firmware.title: Firmware Care - Mobile Stock ROMs
Firmware.description: Firmware Care provides stock firmware for 343 mobile brands, including drivers, flash tools, and manuals, hosted on Google Drive and MediaFire.

Firmware.title: RepairMyMobile - Android Flash Files
Firmware.description: RepairMyMobile offers flash files for over 30,000 models across 60+ brands, including stock ROMs and installation guides.

Firmware.title: Easy Firmware - All Brands Firmware
Firmware.description: Easy Firmware provides stock ROMs for brands like Huawei, OPPO, Vivo, Nokia, and more, with flash tools and drivers included.

Firmware.title: Hovatek - MediaTek Firmware Guides
Firmware.description: Hovatek offers firmware flashing guides and tools for MediaTek devices, including MTK Client and SP Flash Tool tutorials.
